5 Best Electric Smokers Under $200 To Buy In 2018

November 21, 2018May 9, 2018 by Jack Thompson
22shares
  • Facebook
  • Pinterest22
  • Twitter
  • Google+

Electric smokers are one of the cheapest smokers on the market to find. In this article we share with you the best electric smokers under $200 to help you save more.

Smoking does not need to be an expensive outing. For a small family on the demand of varying expenses, a cheap electric smoker is the best option for you.

This review has handpicked the best cheap electric smokers on the market to aid you in making amazing food while at the same time offering you so much that many other smokers offer, despite their prices.

5 Masterbuilt 20078616 Electric Bullet Smoker 395 19 x 25 x 31.5 90 daysCheck price

If you want the best smoker deals in this territory, save yourself the hassle of browsing through all the Black Friday Deals Week and grab these deals – these are the best we found:

 

Reviews of the best electric smokers under $200

1. Masterbuilt 20070910 30-Inch Black Electric Digital Smoker, Top Controller

Four things that make this smoker a good choice for the price: accurate temperature control, good material build, added features and good heat holder.

These features are the basics of all that you need in an electric smoker. Most electric smokers may not have certain added features like a side loading wood chip compartment to give off smoky flavors to your food while it cooks. For this reason, this smoker has a good mark to it for this addition.

It also comes with a drip pan to aide the user in an easy cleanup after cooking. While cooking, juices and grease drop into this dripping pan which the user will only have to remove and clean.

Temperature like we said earlier is key to smoking and this smoker is made with a thermostat digital temperature and timer control which can be easily managed by an added remote control.

This means you will not necessarily have to change the degrees on the smoker exactly. You can always do this if you are a short distance away from the smoker. This is however, not a reason to ignore your food, you may run into trouble.

It has 4 chrome made racks and cooking area of 730 sq inches which is ideal to make food for 14 people. A very affordable purchase can still be beneficial in food production numbers.

Finally, this smoker holds a good amount of heat while cooking and offers the option to set your ideal cooking temperature and timer, leave it and when the timer is done, it will automatically shut off.

Pros

  • Ensures even cooking
  • Well insulated
  • Easy to use and clean
  • Great temperature control

Cons

  • Not rain proof
Check Price on Amazon

2. Smokehouse Products Little Chief Front Load Smoker

Exciting things to offer in this smoker!

Starting of with is its design. We think the silver looking approach with bold writing is different and commanding. It draws the attention of the buyer quickly which is a smart way of marketing a super affordable electric smoker under $300. In fact, one of the best electric smokers under $100!

It is a front loading smoking unit which is a cool standard like many other smokers, and is a convenient way to place and remove food from your smoker.

It offers a decent cooking surface area with 4 grilling racks which are spacious and perfect for cooking different sizes of meat; large and small chunks. These grills have been attested to be very durable and rust preventive because of their chrome plated designs.

On added benefits, it offers a wood chip pan for smoke flavoring which is very essential for a great cook. It also sits in a dishwasher safe drip pan to collect juices and grease from the food as it cooks. You will no longer have to struggle with clean ups after use.

On of the most amazing features is that this unit comes with a 1.75 pound of hickory wood fuel which is a cool benefit for any entry level user who is not sure of what wood to buy.

It is strongly constructed from embossed aluminum and most excitingly, it has its own recipe booklet to help you out with your food options.

Go ahead and wow your guests but please do not leave this smoker to harsh weathers as it will endanger its build.

Pros

  • No assembly required
  • Strongly built
  • Very easy to operate

Cons

  • Not ideal for cold smoking
Check Price on Amazon

3. Char-Broil Vertical Electric Smoker

This best budget electric smoker is an insulated, double walled smoker constructed of hard steel. When considering the long life span of a smoker, a build like this is what gives you rest with the assurance that you can use it for a long period of time.

Internally, its cooking grates are chrome plated for a long use which can also be adjusted to allow you to grill a variety of foods within as you desire. You can easily grill a full turkey and you will do just fine.

It offers an added wood chip pan and a water pan to provide you with great smoky flavors and moisture respectively as you cook. On disadvantages, this smoker may be too light in weight making its build questionable, but from results that it has yielded, there is strong proof that it is a great smoker.

Cleaning the smoker after use is also made easy with a porcelain made ash pan that collects residues from the wood chips while cooking. Also, a grease cup is provided to collect grease from the cooking process.

Once done cooking, you will able to clean up the smoker just as easily by collecting the waste, discarding them and doing a few wipes here and there.

Pros

  • Easy to install
  • Great smoke flavored foods
  • Easy to clean

Cons

  • Too lightweight
  • No particular temperature setting
Check Price on Amazon

4. Southern Country Smokers 2 in 1 Electric Water Smoker/ Lock ‘N Go Grill

Petite and pretty! Our cute name for this power smoker.

This loaded smoker has various adjustable sides that allows you to transform it from a smoker to a grill in just the blink of an eye!

Kicking off with its heating features, it is built as a heavy duty steel device with great heating elements that lock the best of heat in for awesome results. Then on the outside, it has a heat resistant wooden side and cool to touch hood handles that will prevent burn when touched.

It comes with a built in temperature gauge that reads well and can be well controlled for optimum results for your food. You can adjust airflow with the vented lid to aide with managing this phase.

The inside consists of 2 chrome plated cooking grids for space provision and a water pan to aide with food moisture. The shortfall here is the lack of a wood chip pan to aid with those smoky flavors that you may desire.

Have a good time adjusting this smoker into a grill with its interlocking base and body features. This means your food is going to be amazing with the options to deliver variety in taste and appearance to your family.

Pros

  • Constant flow of flavors
  • Strong and durable
  • Interlocking elements
  • Thorough and even cooking

Cons

  • Heavy power consumption
Check Price on Amazon

5. Masterbuilt 20078616 Electric Bullet Smoker

Talking of affordability and not an electric smoker under $500, this product has you in the best of interest when it comes to price. It is less than $100, making it one of the best electric smokers for the money.

For its cost and size, it offers a very decent cooking space which is ideal for a group of 6 people. It sits in 2 porcelain coated racks which provide enough space to make your food.

On added features, you will find a water bowl in there for moisture creation, a porcelain wood chip tray which may be difficult to load wood chips in but gives off the best of flavors, and a drip pan to catch falling juices and grease. This is so that you have an easy clean at the end of the cook.

Temperature management is well catered for with this bullet smoker, using a thermostat that holds in the right amounts of heat for a great cook. It also has an analog temperature gauge to aide you in setting and adjusting temperatures as you cook.

Carry around the smoker as you please with its side handles that are cool to touch.

Pros

  • Even and consistent smoking
  • Space saving and lightweight
  • Easy to clean

Cons

  • Wood chips may be difficult to load
Check Price on Amazon

Our best choice from the list

All the smokers here have amazing features, but our most loved has almost all the different qualities, but with the highest cooking area.

Hence, the Masterbuilt 20070910 30-Inch Black Electric Digital Smoker, Top Controller is our top best.

It offers 730 square inches of cooking space for its price which is ideal for a group of more than 10 people.

The Masterbuilt brand has long been known for good results, and this model attests to that fact.

It has a wood chip pan for that very important smoke flavor, a water pan to create the moisture that you need and a removable drip pan to help you clean the mess easily after cooking.

Temperature control is amazing with its set it and go timer approach which can still be monitored from a distance using its remote control, the only smoker on this list with a remote control feature.

Low price doesnt mean inferiority; look out for these qualities

Price first

You want to stick to your budget when scanning through a variety of electrical options. Hence this list of electric smokers to keep you in focus.

It is okay to not want to spend so much on a smoker, so you should have this in mind when making a decision. There are many options on the market that cost below $200 and work perfectly.

On the other hand, many manufacturers have foreseen this need, therefore, making models that fit small budgets, so grab the best for you.

Aim for durability

No compromising and lazy buying. A low priced smoker does not mean an inferior one. There are many cheap smokers on the market that are built with great quality so take your time in searching for their quality level.

Look out for materials like heavy duty steel, porcelain, cast iron and stainless steel on both the outer and inner build and you will not be disappointed.

Consider your space

Take an extra step to measure up your space so you have a good idea of what size of smoker will fit well in your space.

Otherwise, you may need to create space which will have been totally unnecessary if you had done your homework well.

Is it complete in parts?

You have the right to be picky. Scan through as many options as you find ensuring that it includes all the parts that you need and more, and that these parts have great reviews about them.

You will save yourself a ton of money by this simple effort. In the future after, you can change some parts which by then, you will have enough money at hand to do so.

Electricity is the source here

This is what we are preaching about here and that should be what you should be looking out for. Electricity is cheap to use, and most electric smokers offer everything a charcoal smoker will offer.

These types of smokers are usually cheaper so it is wise that you place your target on these. On the other hand, you do not get to spend much money on expensive fueling, all you will need to do is to buy flavored wood chips to flavor up your food.

Check to be sure that the smoker is an electric one that needs only electricity to power it up for a great use.

How often do you want to use it?

Are you going to be grilling very often or do you need it for that once in a while event when you invite friends over?

If you do not need it for heavy duty cooking, then you do not have to buy a heavy duty smoker which are usually more expensive.

On the other hand, if you will be smoking 4 to 5 times a month, there are also still options that allow you spend less and are durable to handle the workload.

How good is its temperature control?

Smoking without the ability to work with temperature is a total waste of time. Make sure the smokers temperature controls work very well.

The thermometer, dampers and vents should all be in very good working conditions. This way you will not have to spend extra on a thermometer to be able to read the temperatures in which your food is being cooked in.
